original_text: the family of the house of Levi by itself, and their wives by themselves; the family of the Shimeites by itself, and their wives by themselves;
korean_text: 레위의 족속이 따로 하고 그들의 아내들이 따로 하며 시므이의 족속이 따로 하고 그들의 아내들이 따로 하며

sentences.original_text: the family of the house of Levi by itself
the family of the Shimeites by itself
